item.title: ICSWP sink, swim and win on Southampton tour
item.author: Ryan Clarke,
item.description: They say that all roads lead to Rome, but it seems the M3 leads to Southampton: famous for pretty much nothing, other than being the departing location of the Titanic before it sank. And so it was, that 19 members of swim-polo undertook this pilgrimage with the aim of sinking the Southampton Water â€¦
